sentences.en: All seven plants have had temporary shutdowns this year.
sentences.cn: 今年所有7家工厂都暂时歇业了。

sentences.en: He had been termed a temporary employee.
He is confident the backroom can step into the temporary void.
sentences.cn: 他确信原先的幕后智囊能够填补暂时的空缺。

sentences.en: His job here is only temporary.
sentences.cn: 他在这儿的工作只是临时的。

sentences.en: I was doing temporary secretarial work.
sentences.cn: 我在做临时的秘书工作。

sentences.en: I’m living with my parents, but it’s only temporary.
sentences.cn: 我和父母住在一起，但这只是暂时的。

sentences.en: If there was any disappointment it was probably temporary.
sentences.cn: 即便有点儿失望，也肯定是暂时的。

sentences.en: Jails and temporary detention camps are overflowing.
sentences.cn: 监狱和临时拘留所里人满为患。

sentences.en: Many of those changes could just be a temporary fix.
sentences.cn: 那些变革中可能有很多只是权宜之计。
多数青少年问题是暂时性的。

sentences.en: Opportunism consists of sacrificing fundamental interests in order to gain temporary, partial benefits.
sentences.cn: 机会主义就是牺牲根本的利益,贪图暂时的 、 局部的利益.

sentences.en: She was employed on a temporary basis .
sentences.cn: 她是受雇干临时性工作的。

sentences.en: The painting was returned to Spain on a temporary import licence.
sentences.cn: 这幅画凭着临时进口许可证被送回了西班牙。

sentences.en: This expression gave temporary meaning to a set of features otherwise nondescript.
sentences.cn: 这一词语给整套节目以暂时的意义,否则毫无特色.

sentences.en: Was it just a temporary blip on an otherwise healthy growth curve?
sentences.cn: 这是否是原本良好的增长曲线中暂时的偏离？

sentences.en: When the boat reached Cape Town, we said a temporary goodbye.
sentences.cn: 客轮到达开普敦时，我们暂时分别。

sentences.en: You might want to consider temporary work until you decide what you want to do.
sentences.cn: 在你定下来想做什么之前，也许可以考虑干点临时性工作。

phrases.tran_cn: 临时建筑工程；临时结构，临时构筑物
临时住房，应急住宅；临时住宿
临时避难所；临时收容中心；临时安置所；临时庇护站
暂时存储器；暂时库容；中间存储器

trans.tran_en: continuing for only a limited period of time
